author: costin
msg: Cut&paste the jsp->class mangling code, so runtime can execute
JspServlet depends on compiler and a lot of stuff - with this the only
dep is jasper-runtime.jar and commons-el.jar ( and jsp-api.jar ).

author: costin
msg: I'm sure there are other good examples on starting tomcat without
server.xml, I just wanted to have a simple and minimal one I can use here.

author: chinthaka
msg: Updated some documentation for the release.

author: psmith
msg: Added an icon to the ZeroConf plugin's tab when it detects a discovered device.

author: jsisson
msg: GERONIMO-1268 - Add --long startup option that uses a startup progress output format that is suitable for redirection to a file
Also change all System.exit() calls to use the value 1 in the Daemon in error situations (as discussed on mailing list)
